pageContext.claim: “The king of Saudi Arabia, who is really become just he's a very special man. I mean that. He has taken it [fighting terrorism] to heart. And now they're fighting with other countries that have been funding terrorism. ”
pageContext.analysis: Trump falsely suggests that his trip to Saudi Arabia led the king to launch a fight against terrorism, in particular the current embargo of Qatar by the Saudis and other Arab nations. This is a long festering regional conflict, with little to do with terrorism, and the State Department has tried to remain neutral in order to resolve tensions.
